name: Dragluttony
description:
DRAGLUTTONY is a game where you need to overfeed your opponent baby dragon. 

🎮 🎮 2 PLAYER ONLY GAME

But ATTENTION please ! It's a known fact that dragons can grow really fast... so preserve yours from OBESITY or fly for your life !

You have 3 rounds to prove that you are not a stupid wizard who don't care about his dragon. 

(Short usefull tip: Dragons favorite food is your flesh)

  • Available in english and french !
  • Much better experience with XBOX 360 controllers
  • 100% handmade by a belgian team of 3 membres !
  • We have really cool dragons
